about_the_game:
Dive into the ultimate experience for fans of hidden object games, where every shadow holds a clue. Step into a gripping world of intrigue and suspense, where your skills in seek and find hidden objects are the key to unraveling a deadly crime investigation. This game delivers an unparalleled thrill for lovers of detective games, challenging your instincts and intelligence. Are you ready to face the secrets lurking in the Great Green Reserve? Follow a trail of clues, from a cursed amulet to a village torn apart by corruption, betrayal, and greed.

♟️ Hidden Object Games!

Investigate beautifully crafted crime scenes that blend suspense and discovery. Each location challenges your observation skills, offering puzzles and clues that set an intriguing crime investigation in hidden object games.

♟️ Puzzles and Mini-games!

Each crime scene is packed with challenging sequences that combine traditional seek and find hidden objects gameplay with innovative mini-games and story-driven tasks. Use your sharp eye to uncover the secrets behind every shadow!

♟️ Diverse Characters!

Collaborate with a cast of intriguing personalities, including your experienced partner Paul and former enemies now seeking redemption. Each character brings unique skills and knowledge that could either aid or mislead you!

♟️ High-Stakes Choices!

Your decisions impact the fate of the innocent and guilty alike. In this crime investigation, every action you take shapes the story, balancing justice and mercy as you face dilemmas that only detective games can deliver!

♟️ Dynamic Storyline!

Interrogate suspects, seek and find hidden objects, and solve mystery games. Investigate the murder of truck driver Harry Wright in the dangerous Great Green Reserve. A mysterious amulet at the crime scene reveals a web of corruption, leading you to a village furious over a highway project threatening their burial grounds. Confront Chad Simmons, the businessman behind the highway, and Wabano Folsom, the desperate village elder. Navigate betrayals, uncover a missing diary, and solve the mystery of who benefits from Harry's death. With the help of your partner Paul, navigate a tense narrative that connects personal vendettas, corruption, and redemption in our detective games!
